p: Researchers have claimed that trans-aconitic acid, isolated from ethanolic fractions of Actaea spicata, exhibits cytostatic action against Ehrlichâ€™s ascites tumor [ 73]. Significant antioxidant activity of methanol extract and ethyl acetate fraction has been recorded for the species [ 74]. Similarly, its petroleum, ether, chloroform, methanol, and water extracts have exhibited antidepressant activity in experimental mice [ 75].
